last_episode_to_air.name: No Old Tigers
last_episode_to_air.overview: The agents struggle in the aftermath of the gang war while Briggs tracks down a loose end in order to bring Ari Adamian to justice.

name: Graceland
overview: In Southern California, a beachfront property was seized and turned into a residence for undercover cops. They are all top agents of the DEA, FBI, and Customs and they are living in this house unofficially known as "Graceland". Coming of a new graduating at the top of his class, FBI rookie, Mike Warren, could make the life of a legendary FBI agent Paul Briggs and the others, more complicated or it could reveal the truth. It is based upon actual events.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: An undercover FBI agent learns his job requires more than criminal investigations.

episodes.name: Guadalajara Dog
episodes.overview: Briggs and Mike tilt rival gangs against each other. Mike learns that undercover life has moral complications.

episodes.name: Heat Run
episodes.overview: Briggs helps Lauren with her case against the Russian Mafia. Charlie's C.I. proves unreliable during a drug deal.

episodes.name: Pizza Box
episodes.overview: Mike is recruited by a Nigerian drug lord to teach gang members how to shoot. Paige gets Jakes and Tuturro to go undercover with a marijuana farmer.

episodes.name: O-Mouth
episodes.overview: Mike gets deeper into Bello's organization. Briggs and Charlie resume former identities.

episodes.name: Hair of the Dog
episodes.overview: Mike convinces Bello to steal from a drug cartel. Briggs helps Charlie cover up bad decisions.

episodes.name: Goodbye High
episodes.overview: Charlie decides to tell the house about her bust. Briggs must come clean. Mike believes his investigation is ending.

episodes.name: Bag Man
episodes.overview: The Briggs-Bello alliance is tested due to an ultimatum. Mike must push his limits for the good of the case.

episodes.name: Smoke Alarm
episodes.overview: Bello's last strike initiates a war that Graceland must stop. Charlie meets an unusual ally. Briggs faces the past.

episodes.name: King's Castle
episodes.overview: Charlie learns a secret about Briggs and works with a Federale. Mike finds out that Juan is missing.

episodes.name: Happy Endings
episodes.overview: Briggs and Mike search for the truth about Juan's disappearance. Briggs makes a decision about his future.

episodes.name: Pawn
episodes.overview: Jangles takes a Graceland member hostage. The housemates unite to save one of their own.

episodes.name: The Line
episodes.overview: When a cartel puts a hit on Mike, he returns to Graceland, finding the place changed.

episodes.name: Connects
episodes.overview: Briggs digs up an old connection to help Mike get information. Paige pursues a drug manufacturer.

episodes.name: Tinker Bell
episodes.overview: The team tries to find the bus line responsible for smuggling contraband into the country. Tuturro sells an antique gun to the son of a cartel leader.

episodes.name: Magic Number
episodes.overview: Briggs and Charlie attempt to atone for past misdeeds. Jakes uses secrets to sell his story. Turturro examines his limits.

episodes.name: H-A-Double-P-Y
episodes.overview: The power dynamics are disrupted when Graceland has a surprise visitor. Mike is put in a precarious position. Tuturro risks his cover with Carlito.

episodes.name: The Unlucky One
episodes.overview: The Solano case is in shambles. Paige is deep undercover within a sex trafficking ring. Mike and Briggs need to take extreme measures.

episodes.name: Los Malos
episodes.overview: When Mike comes face-to-face with his greatest enemy, he pledges to do whatever it takes to take the man down.

episodes.name: The Ends
episodes.overview: Charlie tries to bond with a bank robber. Johnny must check his feelings for a cartel leader's daughter. Briggs' life creates complications.

episodes.name: Gratis
episodes.overview: Johnny pitches an alternative way to traffic drugs to the head of a drug cartel in Mexico. Mike must cover up a horrific crime while undercover.

episodes.name: The Head of the Pig
episodes.overview: Worried about Mike pushing boundaries, Briggs and Paige plan to use Briggs' cover to end Mike's operation.

episodes.name: Home
episodes.overview: Briggs learns that someone at Graceland has proof of his past crimes. the team executes a bank heist.

episodes.name: Echoes
episodes.overview: Even as the agents bait their final hooks against the Solano Cartel, it dawns that Sid may still have a few tricks of his own.

episodes.name: Faith 7
episodes.overview: As the arrests of Sid and the Solanos near, even the best laid plans begin to crumble.

episodes.name: B-Positive
episodes.overview: As the agents of Graceland strive to close out their ongoing cases and mend broken relationships, Briggs finds himself coerced into a high-risk undercover operation within the Armenian Mafia.

episodes.name: Chester Cheeto
episodes.overview: Briggs tries to keep control of Ari Adamian while Charlie struggles with the decision to terminate her pregnancy.

episodes.name: Sense Memory
episodes.overview: While Mike's visions and addiction to pain medications start affecting his ability to function in the field, Briggs coaxes a former FBI agent out of retirement to help take down Ari.

episodes.name: Aha
episodes.overview: When Ari Adamian has no recollection of his actions, Briggs helps the Armenian gangster piece together the disturbing details of his lost night.

episodes.name: Piñon Tree
episodes.overview: The death of an agent leaves the housemates reeling; Briggs and Johnny work to rescue Lucia, who's being held by Carlito Solano; and Mike's visions lead him to a small-time crook with a dangerous secret.

episodes.name: Sidewinder
episodes.overview: Mike develops a plan to learn about the contents of Gusti's trunk; and Briggs helps Paige go undercover with the Armenian Mafia's shipping company.

episodes.name: Bon Voyage
episodes.overview: Plans take a turn for the worse when Charlie attempts to pull Amber from Florida; and in an effort to aid Briggs, Paige sets up a bust to pull the plug on the Sarkissian organization. However, things are not always as they seem.

episodes.name: Savior Complex
episodes.overview: As Charlie and Jakes close in on Germaine, Mike's drug addiction reaches a breaking point when he and Gusti are caught in a dangerous situation.

episodes.name: Hand of Glory
episodes.overview: While Mike questions Briggs' true motivations in the Sarkissian Case, Charlie devises a new angle to catch Germaine.

episodes.name: Master of Weak Ties
episodes.overview: Ari rises through the ranks of the Armenian mob; Briggs dodges new suspicions from his housemates; and Charlie and Jakes are one step closer to taking down Germaine.

episodes.name: The Wires
episodes.overview: Johnny goes undercover to stop a gang war; Jakes and Charlie set out to take over Germaine's business; and Mike begins to piece together Briggs' plan.

episodes.name: Dog Catches Car
episodes.overview: The feud between the Sarkissians and a local gang heats up; Briggs' motives are revealed; and Mike hunts for the sarin gas.

episodes.name: No Old Tigers
episodes.overview: The agents struggle in the aftermath of the gang war while Briggs tracks down a loose end in order to bring Ari Adamian to justice.
